title: List of tested softphones
description:
Below is a list of of available Softphones that have been tested and extensively used with the Sippy Softswitch:


X-Lite (How to setup)
Windows 2000/XP, Mac OS X

(download)


Website – https://www.3cx.com (How to setup)

Windows, Linux, MAC OS X, IOS, Android

(download)


Microsip (How to setup)
Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7

(download)


eyeBeam
Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Mac OS X

(download)


Ekiga
Windows, Linux

(download)


Express Talk
Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/2003/Vista, Mac OS X

(download)


PhonerLite
Windows

(download)


KPhone
Linux

(download)


Linphone
Linux, Windows, FreeBSD, OpenBSD 

(download)


Twinkle
Linux

(download)


ZoIPer
Windows, Mac OS X, Linux

(download)
description_text: Below is a list of of available Softphones that have been tested and extensively used with the Sippy Softswitch:     X-Lite (How to setup) Windows 2000/XP, Mac OS X  (download)     Website – https://www.3cx.com (How to setup)  Windows, Linux, MAC OS X, IOS, Android   (download)     Microsip (How to setup) Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7  (download)     eyeBeam Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Mac OS X  (download)   Ekiga Windows, Linux  (download)     Express Talk Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/2003/Vista, Mac OS X  (download)     PhonerLite Windows  (download)     KPhone Linux  (download)   Linphone Linux, Windows, FreeBSD, OpenBSD   (download)     Twinkle Linux  (download)     ZoIPer Windows, Mac OS X, Linux  (download)
